main event: A round white object about the size of a basketball was observed on the radar screen in the Atlantic Ocean.
interesting points: The object was tracked by Ground-Radar for about 3 minutes., The object's speed and altitude could not be accurately determined., The sighting occurred on 15 March 1962., A possible connection to a sighting reported by a Pan American flight was mentioned., The description of the object paralleled typical meteor observations, which are usually shorter in duration.
